doc:
Will Sampson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Will_Sampson 0 William "Will" Sampson Jr. (September 27, 1933 – June 3, 1987) was a Native American painter, actor, and rodeo performer. He is best known for his performance as the apparent deaf and mute Native American Chief Bromden in One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest and as Worm in the 1977 western The White Buffalo, as well as his roles as Taylor in Poltergeist II: The Other Side and Ten Bears in 1976's The Outlaw Josey Wales. William_"_Will_"_Sampson_Jr. ( September_27_,_1933 – June_3_,_1987 ) was a_Native_American_painter , actor , and rodeo_performer . He is_best_known for his_performance as the_apparent_deaf_and_mute_Native_American_Chief_Bromden in One Flew Over the_Cuckoo 's_Nest and as Worm in the_1977_western The_White_Buffalo , as_well_as his_roles as Taylor in Poltergeist_II : The_Other_Side and Ten_Bears in 1976 's The_Outlaw_Josey_Wales .
